titles.title: A resolution urging the Government of Canada to end the commercial seal hunt.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3532-3533)
Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
3/21/2007--Introduced.
Urges the government of Canada to end the commercial seal hunt that opened in the waters off the east coast of Canada on November 15, 2006.
